snippet: In one of several cases no longer blocked by presidential immunity, investigators focused on accusations that Nicolas Sarkozy’s 2007 campaign received illicit donations from people connected to the L’Oréal heiress Liliane Bettencourt.
abstract: French police search the home and office of former president, Nicolas Sarkozy, as part of a longstanding investigation into allegations of illegal financing in his 2007 presidential campaign; inquiry is just one of several Sarkozy is likely to face now that he has lost presidential immunity.
lead_paragraph: In one of several cases no longer blocked by presidential immunity, investigators focused on accusations that Nicolas Sarkozy’s 2007 campaign received illicit donations from people connected to the L’Oréal heiress Liliane Bettencourt.

headline.seo: Nicolas Sarkozy’s Home Is Searched in Financing Inquiry
headline.main: Sarkozy Home and Office Searched in Campaign Finance Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Sarkozy’s Home Is Searched in French Campaign Financing Investigation
